CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 17, reads: "Heagy - Spalding Inquest Scenes - Seeking the Truth - Coroner William D. McClelland presiding over the inquest is flanked by local NAACP Attys. Richard F. Jones (left) and Henry R. Smith Jr. All three persons are seeking the truth in  deaths of Officer Heagy and ex-boxer Al Spalding. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Atty. Richard F. Jones, Coroner William D. McClelland, and Atty. Henry Smith, standing in hallway at Heagy - Spalding inquest
